title: Trident of the Waves
content: Trident of the Waves Very Rare 3~13 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+1 Piercing+1d4 Cold The Water Caller: On a hit, create a 2m water surface centred around the target. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Umberlee, the goddess of the sea, is deeply capricious, intelligent, and not nearly as wet around the edges as her domain might suggest. She often demands sacrificial tribute from sailors, such as their ships, their cargo, and, while she's at i
